description: Palomas are a delicious and refreshing&nbsp;Mexican cocktail made with tequila as the main ingredient. The Ginger Mint&nbsp;Paloma is a twist on the classic recipe that will make you feel like summer has arrived in your mouth.
name: Ginger Mint Paloma

recipeInstructions.name: Combine all ingredients into a tin shaker, then add the ice.

recipeInstructions.name: Shake vigorously for 8–10 seconds. Fine strain into a highball glass.
